name: DockerPublish
description: Invokes the VS Tools for Docker script with optional overrides
author: Colin Dembovsky (colinsalmcorner.com)

inputs.name: pathToPubxml
inputs.label: Path to Pubxml
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the pubxml file (if you have one). Options below override the values in this file.

inputs.name: pathToDockerfile
inputs.label: Path to Dockerfile
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the Dockerfile to use. NOTE: Overrides the Dockerfile path in the pubxml (if you have one)

inputs.name: packOutput
inputs.label: Pack Output Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the built output to publish in the container.

inputs.name: serverUrl
inputs.label: Docker Server URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Docker server URL. Leave blank to take pubxml value.

inputs.name: imageName
inputs.label: Docker image name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name for the Docker image. Leave blank to take pubxml value.

inputs.name: buildOnly
inputs.label: Build only
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked, just run 'Docker build'. Otherwise, start a container from the image. Leave blank to take pubxml value.

inputs.name: hostPort
inputs.label: Host Port
inputs.helpMarkDown: Port to open on the Docker host. Leave blank to take pubxml value.

inputs.name: containerPort
inputs.label: Container Port
inputs.helpMarkDown: Port to open on the container. Leave blank to take pubxml value.

inputs.name: runOptions
inputs.label: Run Options
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify run options. Leave blank to take pubxml value.

inputs.name: appType
inputs.label: App Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set to Web if this is an ASP.NET web app (sets environment options for kestrel). Leave blank to take pubxml value.

inputs.name: isWindowsContainer
inputs.label: Create Windows Container
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set to true if this is a Windows Container. Leave blank to take pubxml value.

inputs.name: authOptions
inputs.label: Auth Options
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use to specify auth options for your Docker server. Leave blank to take pubxml value.

inputs.name: removeConflictingContainers
inputs.label: Remove Conflicting Containers
inputs.helpMarkDown: Remove conflicting containers. Leave blank to take pubxml value.
